### Step Two Implementation

The second phase focuses on deploying AI models and orchestration workflows. This includes:
- Custom Hugging Face model deployment in watsonx.ai.
- Integration of watsonx components via API controls.
- Configuration of prebuilt and custom workflows for TLH reporting.
- Development of modular skills for PDF generation and email workflows.
